mapper.select: SELECT c.CAT_NAME, COUNT(b.BOARD_NO) AS post_count FROM category c left join board b on b.BOARD_CODE = c.CAT_CODE WHERE c.CAT_NAME NOT IN ('자유', '공지') group by c.CAT_NAME,c.CAT_NAME;
mapper.insert: insert into category(CAT_CODE, CAT_NAME, BOARD_NO) VALUES (#{catCode},#{catName},#{boardNo})
mapper.delete: delete from category c where c.CAT_CODE = #{catCode}
